data.oai_dc:dc: Exact position of each individual nest of the species Apis dorsata in a 68 km2 study zone. First column is a nest identifier, second and third columns are the latitude and longitude of the nest, fourth column is the site identifier, fifth column is the village name, sixth column is the land-use type (coffee agroforestry plantation or forest fragment), seventh and eighth column is species name and girth (in cm) of the tree carrying the nest, and last column is the census year. The data have been collected in February-March 2014.
